product_name: Phorm S 430 Gel Max Saddle - Men's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Part of the Phorm Touring Series, this men's saddle is designed for an upright riding position, with added gel cushioning under the sit bones to deliver comfort during long days on the bike.
short_description: Part of the Phorm Touring Series, this men's saddle is designed for an upright riding position, with added gel cushioning under the sit bones to deliver comfort during long days on the bike.
